claim: Transformers (film) is a science fiction film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Science fiction film  (  or sci-fi  )  is a genre that uses speculative , fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science , such as extraterrestrial lifeforms , alien worlds , extrasensory perception and time travel , along with futuristic elements such as spacecraft , robots , cyborgs , interstellar travel or other technologies .
